narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Cornerstone Home Care Services Inc. is a Home Health provider based in Hicksville, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $12.7M in Medicaid payments across 103K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $12.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
